text: The 1956 Tour de Hongrie was the 17th edition of the Tour de Hongrie cycle race and was held from 29 July to 5 August 1956. The race started and finished in Budapest. The race was won by Győző Török. ==Route== {| class="wikitable" |+ Stages of the 1956 Tour de Hongrie |- ! scope="col" | Stage ! scope="col" | Date ! scope="col" | Route ! scope="col" | Distance ! scope="col" colspan="2" | Type ! scope="col" | Winner |- ! scope="col" | 1 | style="text-align:right;" | 29 July | Budapest to Szombathely | | alt= | Plain stage | |- ! scope="col" | 2 | style="text-align:right;" | 30 July | Szombathely to Nagykanizsa | | alt= | Plain stage | |- ! scope="col" | 3 | style="text-align:right;" | 31 July | Nagykanizsa to Pécs | | alt= | Intermediate stage | |- ! scope="col" | 4 | style="text-align:right;" | 1 August | Pécs to Szeged | | alt= | Plain stage | |- ! scope="row" | | style="text-align:center;" | 2 August | colspan="2" | Szeged | | colspan="3" | Rest day |- ! scope="col" | 5 | style="text-align:right;" | 3 August | Szeged to Debrecen | | alt= | Plain stage | |- ! scope="col" | 6 | style="text-align:right;" | 4 August | Debrecen to Miskolc | | link= | Individual time trial | |- ! scope="col" | 7 | style="text-align:right;" | 5 August | Miskolc to Budapest | | alt= | Plain stage | |- | colspan="3" style="text-align:center" | Total | colspan="4" style="text-align:center" | '''''' |} ==General classification== {| |Final general classification {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col" | Rank ! scope="col" | Rider ! scope="col" | Team ! scope="col" | Time |- | style="text-align:center;" | 1 | | Honvéd | style="text-align:right;" | |- | style="text-align:center;" | 2 | | Építők | style="text-align:right;" | + 5' 54" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 3 | | Szikra | style="text-align:right;" | + 19' 13" |} |} ==References== 1956 Tour de Hongrie Tour de Hongrie
